title: Why am a level 9 on the boards (Currently lvl 30 in game.)
body:
Why am I a level 9 on your boards. 

I am unable to post replies because it says I am level 9. (Currently lvl 30 in game.)

Another question is ... why is your software really buggy? One would think you would have things solid after almost 10 years of working on it.

replies.body:
Looks like you're already level 30 on the boards! For future reference, your boards level = your summoner level on the client. Sometimes it might take making a post before the boards can sync your profiles. There is a lot going on in the background between the boards and the game client, so sometimes it just needs a little push to update that profile level. 

Are you having any bugs in particular? If I know a little about what's bugging out for you, I should be able to help you troubleshoot!
It says that you are level 30 for me.
Please explain why it is a multi-million dollar software company that depends on their software lets it have usability bugs?
